mapper.sql: id, goodsNo, name, originPrice, nowPrice,totalnum, balance, description, pictureUrl, seckillBeginTime, seckillEndTime, comment, createTime, updateTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_goods
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_goods (id, goodsNo, name, originPrice, nowPrice, totalnum,balance, description, pictureUrl, seckillBeginTime, seckillEndTime, comment, createTime, updateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nowprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seckillbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{seckillendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_goods
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodsNo = #{record.goodsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
originPrice = #{record.originprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
nowPrice = #{record.nowprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
totalnum = #{record.totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
balance = #{record.balance,jdbcType=INTEGER},

pictureUrl = #{record.pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_goods set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goodsNo = #{record.goodsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, originPrice = #{record.originprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, nowPrice = #{record.nowprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalnum = #{record.totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pictureUrl = #{record.pictureurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seckillBeginTime = #{record.seckillbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, seckillEndTime = #{record.seckillendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comment = #{record.comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

goodsNo = #{goodsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
